item.title: The Bathtub Murder of Kendy Howard
item.description: Did a former Idaho state trooper use his law enforcement skills to stage his wifeâ€™s death in their bathtub? "48 Hours" correspondent Peter Van Sant re...

item.title: 2 wounded in shooting at Spartan College in Inglewood; suspect in custody
item.description: Two of the victims were believed to be female employees of the college, Inglewood's mayor told CBS News Los Angeles.

item.title: 2 killed when small plane crashes into Simi Valley neighborhood
item.description: Residents were inside of both homes at the time of the crash, but firefighters say they were able to make it out unharmed.

item.title: 5.4-magnitude earthquake rattles rural southeastern New Mexico, West Texas
item.description: The U.S. Geological Survey reports that the earthquake's epicenter was about 35 miles south of Whites City, New Mexico.

item.title: Katie Ledecky breaks her own world record in the 800-meter freestyle
item.description: Katie Ledecky now has the top 10 performances all-time in the event, according to USA Swimming.
